resources.string: \tHold click on a picture to save it to your own device\n\t\t Hold it again on the same picture to delete it from the device. The pictures are not readable from the files manager, however it will load faster next time you enter the respective group. You can clear the defaults in the options menu.
Icons made by www.freepik.com and www.google.com from www.flaticon.com and adapted by us using Photoshop.

The Groupic application was developed by
	Ardelean Andrei-Timotei (timitoc@yahoo.com)
and
	Goran Constantin-Cornel (cornelg7@yahoo.com)

\tGroupic is a simple way to organize photos in your family or in a group of friends. Join groups with people so that you can share with them both important moments of your life and other boring stuff such as school essays and homework.\n\tIt\'s never been easier!
